tool_description: Creates optimal posting schedules across multiple platforms based on timing analysis and platform-specific best practices.

campaign_duration_days.description: Total duration of posting campaign in days (1-90)

priority_platforms.description: Platforms that should be posted to first

avoid_weekends.description: Whether to avoid posting on weekends

posting_frequency.description: Posting frequency: daily, weekly, biweekly, custom

error_messages: Invalid start date: Start date must be in the future and properly formatted.
Invalid campaign duration: Duration must be between 1 and 90 days.
Invalid timezone: Provide a valid timezone identifier.
Platform mismatch: Priority platforms must be subset of target platforms.
Invalid posting frequency: Must be one of [daily, weekly, biweekly, custom].
Too many platforms: Maximum 8 platforms can be scheduled simultaneously.
usage: Specify target platforms, start date, campaign duration, and timezone. Optionally set priority platforms and posting preferences. The tool generates an optimized posting schedule.

posting_schedule.description: Detailed schedule with platform and datetime pairs

optimal_times.description: Optimal posting times for each platform

campaign_end_date.description: Final posting date of the campaign
